  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.app.ActionBar.TabListener, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnInitListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, DIYFragment.onVoiceOnOff

    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements android.app.ActionBar.TabListener, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnInitListener, DIYFragment.onVoiceOnOff
    Main activity that holds the three fragments and communicates with service.
    Author:
    chmod

      • mSectionsPagerAdapter

        MainActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter mSectionsPagerAdapter
        The PagerAdapter that will provide fragments for each of the sections. We use a FragmentPagerAdapter derivative, which will keep every loaded fragment in memory. If this becomes too memory intensive, it may be best to switch to a FragmentStatePagerAdapter.

      • mViewPager

        android.support.v4.view.ViewPager mViewPager
        The ViewPager that will host the section contents.

      • doBindService

        void doBindService()
        Establish a connection with the service. We use an explicit class name because there is no reason to be able to let other applications replace our component. Run in another thread
